posts.post_content:
I was saving for a 33 Goudey Ruth but have decided those prices are just too silly for me right now. So, I have a decent little war chest saved up and am looking to put it towards other needs. May be interested in the following. If anyone is selling, let me know what you’re thinking. I’m going to post on other threads as well. What I’m looking for in T206:

Young Portrait SGC 1-2
Speaker, Non-Piedmont back SGC 1-2
Baker, non Piedmont back, SGC 1-2
Eddie Collins SGC 1-2
